class_notes: Students are not able to enroll themselves in this course. After the required audition has been successful, the Department of Music will enroll students directly.
course_description: Non-music majors. Prerequisite: permission of instructor. The study of applied music involves the understanding of music literature through performance on a specific instrument. One-hour private instruction weekly.  Students are required to practice a minimum of three hours per week and perform a final jury exam.  Contact the instructor to arrange an audition. Lesson fees apply;  refer to the departmental website (www.music.emory.edu) for current information.
sections: Class Nbr: 5483, Section #: 4, Type: MUS, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: B. Howard, Status: Open
